scripts.import:db-docker: docker cp ./data/clinics.json vetsplet-mongo-db:/clinics.json && docker exec -it vetsplet-mongo-db mongoimport --db VetClinicDB --collection clinics --mode upsert --upsertFields id --jsonArray --file clinics.json && docker cp ./data/clients.json vetsplet-mongo-db:/clients.json && docker exec -it vetsplet-mongo-db mongoimport --db VetClinicDB --collection clients --mode upsert --upsertFields id --jsonArray --file clients.json && docker cp ./data/appointments.json vetsplet-mongo-db:/appointments.json && docker exec -it vetsplet-mongo-db mongoimport --db VetClinicDB --collection appointments --mode upsert --upsertFields id --jsonArray --file appointments.json
scripts.delete:db-docker: docker exec -it vetsplet-mongo-db bash -c "mongosh VetClinicDB --eval 'db.clinics.deleteMany({})'"; docker exec -it vetsplet-mongo-db bash -c "mongosh VetClinicDB --eval 'db.clients.deleteMany({})'"; docker exec -it vetsplet-mongo-db bash -c "mongosh VetClinicDB --eval 'db.appointments.deleteMany({})'"
scripts.view:db-docker: docker exec -it vetsplet-mongo-db bash -c "mongosh VetClinicDB --eval 'db.clinics.find()'"; docker exec -it vetsplet-mongo-db bash -c "mongosh VetClinicDB --eval 'db.clients.find()'"; docker exec -it vetsplet-mongo-db bash -c "mongosh VetClinicDB --eval 'db.appointments.find()'"
scripts.ganache: ganache --wallet.totalAccounts 5 --wallet.defaultBalance 100 --wallet.mnemonic "nuclear seat much sketch element fame hard hedgehog local expect speed cinnamon" --wallet.passphrase "my little secret"
